text: Yuma is a city in and the county seat of Yuma County, Arizona, United States. According to the 2020 Census, the population of the city is 95,548. ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Yuma Website *Yuma Convention and Visitors Bureau Website *MCAS Yuma Official Website *Yuma Stats Category:Cities in Arizona Category:County seats in Arizona Category:1914 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Arizona
title: Yuma, Arizona
